channel_name: Pokémon: BW Adventures in Unova and Beyond
channel_description: Ash takes on the Unova League, meets N, battles Team Plasma, and more in Pokémon: BW Adventures in Unova and Beyond, now on Pokémon TV!

media.title: Beauties Battling for Pride and Prestige!
media.description: On their way to the site of the upcoming Unova League, our heroes take on an unexpectedly messy battle challenge!

media.title: A Surface to Air Tag Battle Team!
media.description: As our heroes continue their trek to Vertress City and the Unova League, they’re challenged to a Tag Battle the likes of which they’ve never experienced!

media.title: A Village Homecoming!
media.description: On their way to Vertress City, our heroes are visiting the Village of Dragons, where Iris is confronted with several life-changing challenges!

media.title: Drayden Versus Iris: Past, Present, and Future!
media.description: As Iris takes on a battle challenge issued by Opelucid Gym Leader Drayden, little does she know what's truly in store!

media.title: Team Eevee and the Pokémon Rescue Squad!
media.description: Ash and Iris are saved from a landslide by Virgil and his team of Eevee evolutions. Now it’s their turn to help him out!

media.title: Curtain Up, Unova League!
media.description: The big event we’ve all been waiting for is ready to begin! Watch the early action featuring Ash against his rival Trip!

media.title: Mission: Defeat Your Rival!
media.description: As the battle excitement in Vertress City builds to a fever pitch, the Unova League pairs friends and rivals, old and new!

media.title: Lost at the League!
media.description: While the Unova League prepares to move to the third round, our heroes are faced with a case of lost and found!

media.title: Strong Strategy Steals the Show!
media.description: As the Unova League makes its way through the third round and barrels toward the quarterfinals, strategy and friendship lead the way!

media.title: Cameron’s Secret Weapon!
media.description: It’s the fourth round of the Unova League, and Cameron’s “secret weapon” turns out to be more than anyone thought, including Cameron!

media.title: A Unova League Evolution!
media.description: As the Unova League roars toward the final match, the competition becomes more fierce, and the strength and skill levels more amazing!

media.title: New Places...Familiar Faces!
media.description: Now that the Unova League is over, our heroes contemplate what the future holds, while a new friend helps them deal with a blast from the past!

media.title: The Name's N!
media.description: On a ship heading to meet Professor Cedric Juniper at the White Ruins, our heroes are introduced to a young man with an unusual gift and an equally unusual point of view!

media.title: There’s a New Gym Leader in Town!
media.description: After arriving in Aspertia City at the request of Professor Juniper, our heroes pay a visit to one of the most unusual Gyms they’ve ever seen!

media.title: Team Plasma’s Pokémon Power Plot!
media.description: Continuing their journey to the White Ruins, our heroes encounter a mysterious organization with a sinister plot!

media.title: The Light of Floccesy Ranch!
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to the White Ruins, they come across a Mareep ranch with some fog and leadership issues!

media.title: Saving Braviary!
media.description: Team Plasma is on the move, and so is N!

media.title: The Pokémon Harbor Patrol!
media.description: Arriving in Virbank City, our heroes and N encounter another group of heroes with some surprising results!

media.title: The Fires of a Red-Hot Reunion!
media.description: After discovering a festival celebrating the sights and sounds of the Kanto region, Ash reunites with an old friend who shows what real staying power is all about!

media.title: Team Plasma’s Pokémon Manipulation!
media.description: Team Plasma is determined to execute its evil plans, but our heroes and N have other ideas!

media.title: Secrets From Out of the Fog!
media.description: As our heroes continue their journey to the White Ruins, they learn startling secrets about N and Team Plasma!

media.title: Meowth, Colress, and Team Rivalry!
media.description: As Team Plasma’s mission to control Pokémon continues, Team Rocket’s mission takes aim at Team Plasma!

media.title: Ash and N: A Clash of Ideals!
media.description: Professor Cedric Juniper has unearthed a mysterious stone at the White Ruins. What connection does this object have with the Legendary Pokémon Reshiram?

media.title: Team Plasma and the Awakening Ceremony!
media.description: As Team Plasma’s plan to steal the Light Stone unfolds, our heroes and their friends are doing everything they can to stop it!

media.title: What Lies Beyond Truth and Ideals!
media.description: As the evil plan to control Reshiram continues to unfold, the survival of the world lies in Team Plasma’s defeat. But can they be defeated?!

media.title: Farewell, Unova! Setting Sail for New Adventures!
media.description: As our heroes prepare to enjoy the next chapter of their exciting adventures, others have different plans!

media.title: Danger, Sweet as Honey!
media.description: As our heroes begin exploring the Decolore Islands, their first stop starts off as a not-so-sweet experience!

media.title: Cilan and the Case of the Purrloin Witness!
media.description: As our heroes continue their Decolore Island-hopping cruise, a shipboard theft calls for some super-Connoisseur sleuthing!

media.title: Crowning the Scalchop King!
media.description: Arriving on Scalchop Island, our heroes decide to participate in an unusual competition!

media.title: The Island of Illusions!
media.description: A deserted island gives our heroes the opportunity to witness what enduring friendship is all about!

media.title: To Catch a Rotom!
media.description: Arriving on Torom Island, our heroes meet up with an old friend on an important research mission!

media.title: The Pirates of Decolore!
media.description: As our heroes continue their cruise through the Decolore Islands, a surprise visit by some unusual pirates changes everyone’s course!

media.title: Butterfree and Me!
media.description: As our heroes continue their tour of the Decolore Islands by ship, one island in particular offers them a chance to change a life for the better—forever!

media.title: The Path That Leads to Goodbye!
media.description: As they explore Capacia Island on their way to the Kanto region, little do our heroes know that the path they’re on leads to a place they never imagined!

media.title: Searching For a Wish!
media.description: Visiting a seemingly lifeless part of Capacia Island, our heroes come upon a life-giving solution to its problem!

media.title: Capacia Island UFO!
media.description: A bright light in the night sky gives our heroes a strange change of pace...and face!

media.title: The Journalist from Another Region!
media.description: As our heroes continue their tour of the Decolore Islands, they encounter a windfall of delicious berries and unexpected new friends!

media.title: Mystery on a Deserted Island!
media.description: Arriving on a deserted island on a quest for treasure, our heroes find something much more precious than they anticipated!

media.title: A Pokémon of a Different Color!
media.description: When Ash runs into an old friend en route to the Kanto region, Iris discovers a true kindred spirit!

media.title: Celebrating the Hero’s Comet!
media.description: As our heroes continue their tour of the Decolore Islands, an upcoming celestial event sets the stage for celestial intrigue and delight!

media.title: Go, Go, Gogoat!
media.description: A surprise detour in the Decolore Islands challenges our heroes to help some new friends in need!

media.title: Team Rocket’s Shocking Recruit!
media.description: A playful moment turns into a big misunderstanding, and our heroes are about to face a major challenge!

media.title: Survival of the Striaton Gym!
media.description: Cilan’s brothers arrive for a surprise visit, bringing with them the challenge of a lifetime!

media.title: Best Wishes Until We Meet Again!
media.description: As our heroes near Vermilion City and the end of their shipboard adventures, one familiar challenge forces them to spring into action!

media.title: The Dream Continues!
media.description: A visit to Pallet Town to see family and friends shows just how enduring Ash’s dreams really are!
